definition: exterior product/the cross product of two vectors

to amass/to accumulate/to store/measured quantity (such as area of volume)/product (the result of multiplication)/to integrate (math.)/to solve (or integrate) an ordinary differential equation (math.)/old/long-standing

sentences.english: So, typically, we use cross product to find plane equations.
sentences.chinese: 特別地，可以用外積來求平面方程。

sentences.english: Right, when we do cross products, we are doing an expansion with respect to the first row.
sentences.chinese: 算外積時，依第一行展開。
